title: How to analyze EFI dynamically?
content:
I'm new to reversing UEFI Malware. There is a UEFI rootkit called MoonBounce which I'm trying to analyze dynamically; It's an EFI driver.

I tried a tool called efi_dxe_emulator but it needs an NVRAM file that I don't know exactly how to get it.

Is there a better way to dynamically analyze this EFI file?
